ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And lots were cast (when a storm overtook them), he was rejected, (and thrown overboard).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: cast lots, and was among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and sailed away in a laden ship, wherein people cast lots. Because he lost, he was thrown into the water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then lots were drawn and he became of those who were pushed into the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he (agreed to) cast lots, and he was among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he shared (with them), but was of those who are cast off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and cast lots, and was of the rebutted,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And then drew lots and was of those rejected;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And then they cast lots and he was the one who lost,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he joined the lots, and was of the condemned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: he drew lots with them and was the one to be condemned [as one to be thrown overboard].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He (agreed to) cast lots, and he was condemned:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (agreed to) cast lots, and he was among the losers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and cast lots, and he was among the losers (of the lots that were cast).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:141] Then he drew lots, with the passengers on the ship, and was of those rejected, of the losers in the draw and   so they threw him into the sea.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And then drew lots and was of those rejected) he lost and threw himself in the sea;
